homepage.title: Sudan Passport Services
homepage.subtitle: Ministry of Interior
homepage.heroDescription: Apply for your passport renewal from the comfort of your home. Our secure digital platform ensures your documents are processed quickly and safely.
homepage.featuresSubtitle: Experience the future of government services with our cutting-edge passport renewal system
homepage.aiValidationDesc: Advanced AI technology automatically validates your documents, reducing processing time and ensuring accuracy.
homepage.faceRecognitionDesc: Real-time face detection and validation ensures your passport photo meets all government requirements.
homepage.realTimeTrackingDesc: Monitor your application progress with instant updates and notifications throughout the review process.
homepage.securePaymentsDesc: Safe and encrypted payment processing with multiple payment options for your convenience.
homepage.adminDashboardDesc: Comprehensive admin interface for government officials to review and process applications efficiently.
homepage.dataProtectionDesc: Your personal information is protected with government-grade security and encryption standards.
homepage.servicesSubtitle: Choose the service that fits your needs
homepage.newPassportService: Apply for your first Sudanese passport with our streamlined process.
homepage.renewalService: Renew your existing passport quickly and securely online.
homepage.replacementService: Replace lost, stolen, or damaged passports with ease.
homepage.fastProcessingDesc: Quick turnaround times for all applications
homepage.secureDesc: Bank-level security for your personal data
homepage.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of Sudanese citizens who have already renewed their passports online

auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your passport application dashboard
auth.registerSubtitle: Get started with your passport renewal application
auth.registerSuccess: Account created successfully! Please log in.
auth.createAccountDesc: Create your account to apply for passport renewal
auth.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions

application.title: Passport Application
application.typeSelectDescription: Select the type of passport service you need.
application.newPassportDesc: Apply for a passport for the first time
application.renewalDesc: Renew an existing passport that is expiring or has expired
application.replacementDesc: Replace a lost, stolen, or damaged passport
application.correctionDesc: Correct information on an existing passport
application.processingTimeNote: Processing times are estimates and may vary during peak periods
application.expressDocNote: Express processing requires additional documentation verification
application.feesNonRefundable: Fees are non-refundable once application is submitted
application.biometricRequired: All applicants must appear in person for biometric data collection
application.currentPassportDesc: Enter the details from your current passport that needs to be {type}.
application.documentsNeeded: You will need to upload the following documents:
application.currentPassportPages: Clear photo/scan of your current passport (all pages)
application.personalInfoDesc: Enter your personal details as they appear on your national ID.
application.nationalIdValidation: National ID must be exactly 10 digits
application.ageRequirementDesc: Applicants must be at least 16 years old to apply for a passport. For minors under 16, a guardian must apply on their behalf with additional documentation.
application.matchNationalId: All information must match exactly with your National ID card. Any discrepancies may cause delays in processing your application. Make sure to double-check all entries before proceeding.
application.travelInfoDesc: Provide details about your intended travel plans. This information helps us process your application appropriately.
application.addCountry: Add countries you plan to visit
application.additionalNotesDesc: Any additional information about your travel plans (optional)
application.documentUploadDesc: Upload the required documents for your passport application. All documents must be clear and legible.
application.passportPhotoDesc: Upload a recent passport-sized photo (2x2 inches, white background, facing forward)
application.identityDocumentDesc: Upload a clear copy of your national ID card or birth certificate
application.citizenshipDocumentDesc: Upload proof of Sudanese citizenship (birth certificate, naturalization certificate, etc.)
application.supportingDocumentDesc: Upload any additional supporting documents (marriage certificate, court order, etc.)
application.currentPassportCopyDesc: Upload a clear copy of your current passport (all pages with stamps/visas)
application.highQualityFormat: All documents must be in clear, high-quality format
application.whiteBackground: Photos must have white background and show full face
application.certifiedTranslations: Documents in languages other than Arabic or English must include certified translations
application.reviewApplicationDesc: Please review all information carefully before submitting. You can go back to edit any section if needed.
application.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
application.confirmAccuracy: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete
application.paymentNotCompleted: Please complete payment before submitting your application.
application.confirmationEmail: Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email with your application number.
application.additionalEmergencyContactDescription: You may provide a second emergency contact for additional safety.
application.emergencyContactGuidelines1: Choose someone who is easily reachable and available
application.emergencyContactGuidelines2: Ensure they know about your travel plans and passport application
application.emergencyContactGuidelines3: This contact will be notified only in case of emergency
application.emergencyContactGuidelines4: Make sure the phone number is active and regularly monitored
application.emergencyContactGuidelines5: Consider time zones when choosing international emergency contacts
application.emergencyContactGuidelines6: Provide the complete international address including country
application.privacyNoticeDescription: Emergency contact information is kept confidential and used only for official passport-related emergencies or as required by consular services. This information will not be shared with third parties.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.manageApplications: Manage your passport applications and track their progress from your dashboard.
dashboard.applicationSubmittedSuccess: Application #{number} submitted successfully! You will receive email updates as your application progresses.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.applicationNotFoundDesc: The requested application could not be found.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB
validation.invalidFileType: Only JPEG, PNG, and PDF files are allowed
validation.nationalIdInvalid: National ID must be exactly 10 digits
validation.phoneInvalid: Phone number must be in format +249xxxxxxxxx
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.mustBe18: You must be at least 18 years old

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

footer.ministry: Ministry of Interior - Republic of Sudan

footer.copyright: Official government portal for passport renewal services.
